Text.Page:
In order to tame a beast, you must first know what it eats.

If you feed it something it likes, say Tirkai grizzly steaks, it'll trust you.4

After Val Tirkai fell to the argons, it became difficult to obtain the steaks here in Velika, but you obviously managed.

Youâ€™ll earn the beast's trust with this.4
Taming a beast is no simple matter, and the shortest route to their hearts is through their stomachs.
